name: corecontrol
description: CoreControl is a modern, self-hosted control center for managing multiple servers and services. It supports monitoring, commands, and management from a sleek web dashboard, ideal for home labs and sysadmins.
features: Multi-Server Management: Control multiple servers from one dashboard. Centralized administration.
Service Monitoring: Track status and health of all services. Stay informed instantly.
Remote Commands: Execute commands across servers remotely. Efficient system management.
Sleek Dashboard: Modern web interface for intuitive control. Beautiful and functional.
Home Lab Ready: Perfect for managing personal server infrastructure. Ideal for enthusiasts.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your server management platform. Your infrastructure, your rules.
